00658E22.VoiceDir5.EED6F: Preaching. Exultant. Chanting the holy names of the Prime Evils.

5D7334F1.Line1.EED6F: Agony is the divine catalyst! Thy bones shall crack as they lengthen and twist. Thy flesh, rent asunder to be molded anew. Fur, fang, hoof, and horn!

CC7C9B1E.Preaching. Exultant. Human, not a: :  Accent is slight (can lean Greek, if possible.)

F767AE73.Line3.EED6F: Drink thee now of the blood and bile. As Humanity bleeds away, let Hell take its place!
